arts.ttl: Bayern Munich star Alphonso Davies reluctant to celebrate much with massive challenge in Bayer Leverkusen just ahead
arts.sum: Bayern Munich star Alphonso Davies appreciated the team’s 5-0 demolition of Werder Bremen, but was already wary of what lies ahead during the postgame media scrum. Looking for more thoughts and analysis on Bayern Munich’s 5-0 demolition of Werder Bremen?

arts.ttl: Transfer Talk: Bayern's Davies to join Real Madrid on a free
arts.sum: Bayern Munich have given up on a contract renewal for Alphonso Davies while Real Madrid are determined to ensure they sign the left-back, as has been reported by Relevo . That is especially interesting for them as the possibility of Davies renewing his Bayern contract is becoming increasingly unlikely, with talks between the Bavarian club and his agent currently being non-existent.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich’s Vincent Kompany full of praise for “special talent” Michael Olise
arts.sum: However, if he continues in this vein of form for the rest of the season, he will be well on his way to becoming, at the very least, one of the best players in the world. To say Michael Olise has hit the ground running at Bayern Munich would be an understatement.

arts.ttl: Player ratings: Werder Bremen 0-5 Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Bayern Munich kept the good vibes flowing with another dominant win on Saturday, this time 5-0 on the road at SV Werder Bremen. This Bayern team does not conserve it.

arts.ttl: “We’re Bayern and we don’t change” — Harry Kane promises to bring the fight to Leverkusen next week
arts.sum: Next Saturday, it will be the German Rekordmeister hosting the defending champions. Next Saturday, we will find out when Bayern Munich plays host to Bayer Leverkusen in the most anticipated match of the Bundesliga Hinrunde .

arts.ttl: Jamal Musiala praises Michael Olise, who still won’t give an interview after Bayern Munich’s 5-0 win over Werder Bremen
arts.sum: While Olise’s postgame antics leave a lot to be desired, Musiala praised him nonetheless and how they link up with each other when playing on the pitch. Michael Olise doesn’t want to give an interview.

arts.ttl: Five observations from Bayern Munich’s one-sided victory over Werder Bremen
arts.sum: A sometimes difficult opponent in recent years, having beaten the team from Munich 1-0 in their last meeting and starting the season well, Bremen looked to cause another upset. After a record-breaking performance mid-week in the Champions League against Dinamo Zagreb, Bayern Munich returned to Bundesliga action to face Werder Bremen.

arts.ttl: Alphonso Davies to Real Madrid – The latest
arts.sum: A fresh insight into the long-running saga linking Bayern Munich star Alphonso Davies with a move to Real Madrid has on Saturday been provided. And the news will no doubt…

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s stunning 5-0 demolition of Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Bayern Munich recorded their fourth straight win in the league and will maintain their position atop the Bundesliga table as they saw off Werder Bremen thanks to another 5 goals, this time courtesy of Jamal Musiala, Harry Kane, Micheal Olise, and Serge Gnabry. Maybe this is cheating, but Laimer started at right-back and had a fantastic performance higher up the pitch, overlapping very well with Joshua Kimmich and establishing a strong partnership with Micheal Olise.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich demolish Werder Bremen as Michael Olise and Harry Kane shine in 5-0 victory
arts.sum: Michael Olise registered two goals and two assists as Bayern Munich maintained their perfect start to the season with a 5-0 win over Werder Bremen. Jamal Musiala celebrates after scoring Bayern Munich's second goal against Werder Bremen - IMAGO/nordphoto GmbH / Kokenge
